name: Me and the A.I.
description:
You wake up in a strange facility and hear a voice in your head.

There is an A.I. in your system and you are a cyborg.

Try to escape from the facility and see what is outside.

=========================================

I made the game from 12.08.2022 to 14.08.2022 because of WOWIEEEE jam 4.0

This is my first game jam and I had a lot of fun to make it.

I hope you enjoy the game. HAVE FUN!
